title: course search api returns relevant courses
description: Test the course search API to ensure it returns relevant courses based on title, category, description, and instructor with fuzzy matching and intelligent scoring. Verify that the results are ranked by relevance score, handle typos and partial matches, return a maximum of 12 courses, and respond within 2 seconds.

title: ai course recommendations provide similar courses
description: Test the AI course recommendation API to verify it provides 10 similar courses for any given course ID using ML-based TF-IDF and cosine similarity. Ensure fallback to category-based recommendations if the ML model fails, and check that recommendations are relevant and diverse.

title: trending courses api returns top courses by subscribers
description: Test the trending courses API to confirm it returns the top 10 courses sorted by subscriber count in descending order. Verify that course metadata such as title, rating, price, and instructor are included and that the trending list updates dynamically.

title: top rated courses api filters and sorts courses
description: Test the top rated courses API to ensure it filters courses with rating >= 4.0 and reviews >= 10, sorts them by rating in descending order, and returns the top 10 rated courses. Verify fallback to all courses if not enough high-rated ones are available.

title: frontend course browser supports interactive features
description: Test the frontend course browser for responsive design on desktop and mobile, live search suggestions, horizontal scrolling course carousels, course detail modals with recommendations, watchlist functionality using local storage, and user profile and preferences management.

title: static asset serving handles assets efficiently
description: Test the static asset serving functionality to ensure HTML, CSS, and JS files are served with proper MIME types, asset requests include appropriate caching headers, course images have fallbacks for missing images, and all static routes respond within 100ms.

title: api health and status endpoints respond correctly
description: Test the API health and status endpoints to verify the health check returns system status, the model status endpoint shows AI/ML system readiness including configuration and data loading status, and responses are returned within 50ms.

title: personalized recommendations integrate udemy api
description: Test the personalized recommendations feature with Udemy API integration to ensure real-time data retrieval, user preference-based filtering (mood, language, budget), fallback to local recommendations if the API fails, and graceful handling of rate limits and API errors.
